name: Presumed Dead
description:
Lore

After a huge, magical explosion that tore reality asunder, you find yourself alone in an unknown world. 

This maze-like forest is overrun by relentless slimes, powerful liches, and massive golems. It's up to you to fight your way through the woods to find your way back home.

 Brave the forests alone or play with up to three friends and 4 players killing monsters, perk drops, and picking up magical essence to enhance your attributes.  Find scrolls that teach you new abilities. Fighting the boss and activating the portal Find the portal and defeat its guardians to get one step closer to escaping this waking nightmare and returning to your own world where you have been presumed dead.
